tool_description: get the latest covid related news from all over the world
name: Covid News
title: Covid News

api_list.name: Get individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about Covid-19 from specific news sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news/the-guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Covid-19 news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all Covid-19 news from all over the world
